fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Corruption (Day): Reveal yourself as the King, granting yourself lynch immunity.
- Deem (Day): Choose a player. They will gain lynch immunity for the day. The Town will know they have been granted lynch immunity as soon as you use this ability, although it will not be directly attributed to the Diamond.
- Transport (Night, 0 use): Choose two targets to transport.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You gain one charge of Transport when you use Corruption.
- A revealed King is immune to conversion.
